mapper.insert: insert into film(id, filmName, category, time, profiles, actor, director, pic, price) value (#{id}, #{filmName}, #{category}, #{time}, #{profiles}, #{actor}, #{director}, #{pic}, #{price})
mapper.select: select * from film order by id desc

select * from film
filmName like concat('%', #{filmName}, '%')
order by id desc
SELECT * FROM `film` order by score desc limit 0,10

select * from film
category like concat('%', #{category}, '%')
order by id desc
